content.question: The stick charts of the Marshall Islands are distinct from other forms of cartography in that they are used to

choices.label: mark the position of the stars in a seasonal sky
present the patterns of ancestral migration
record the knowledge of an individual navigator

content.answer: record the knowledge of an individual navigator

topic.text: 9.2: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Pacific Art

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Explain how a specific work of art (or group of related works of art) demonstrates continuity and/or change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
